name: Orbithm
description:
How to play:

  • Press D, K, Z, / to sync the music when the note appears on inner line
  • Press F, J, X, > to sync the music when the note appears on outer line

This game I made for Rhythm jam. Advanced mode will be add later after jam.

Credits :

  • Music by Camellia, Jurokuneta, NoKANY, t+pazolite
  • Art by Nin (The redbreast of princess cover art)
  • SFX by Kenney
